pages.text: Fluid Cards are used to send Fluids between inventories, such as tanks.$(br2)Overclocker values are documented on the following page.

MB/T values (max) for Overclockers:$(br2)$(li)0 Overclockers: 5,000mb/20t$(li)1 Overclocker:  10,000mb/15t$(li)2 Overclockers: 20,000mb/10t$(li)3 Overclockers: 30,000mb/5t$(li)4 Overclockers: 40,000mb/1t
